EmailTemplate.name: YMCA SleepOUT
EmailTemplate.subject: YMCA SleepEasy!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
"People shouldn't have to sleep rough. But what can I do?"
With the YMCA's Sleep Easy - you can make a change!
Join your friends at Coventry Cathedral on Friday 13th February to help raise £££ to tackle this problem.
Sign up http://coventryandwarwickshire-ymca.org.uk/sleep-easy-2015-friday-13th-february
and get involved!
